sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react";
import { Image, Text, CheckBox, TextInput, TouchableOpacity, View } from "react-native"
import tw from "twrnc"

export default () => {
    const [isSelected, setSelection] = useState(false);

    return( 
    <View style = {tw`flex flex-row m-0 h-full w-full`}>
        <View style = {tw`h-full w-1/2 p-20`}>
            <View style = {tw`flex flex-col h-5/6 font-medium text-center rounded-lg`}>
                <Text style = {tw`text-3xl`}>
                    WELCOME   BACK
                </Text>
                <Text style = {tw`text-gray-300`}>
                    Welcome back! Please enter your details. 
                </Text>
                <View style = {tw`px-10`}>    
                    <View style = {tw`py-5`}>
                        <Text style = {tw`text-lg text-left`}>
                            Email
                        </Text>
                        <TextInput style = {tw`border-2 text-xl h-10 rounded `}/>
                    </View>
                    <View style = {tw`py-5`}>
                        <Text style = {tw`text-lg text-left`}>
                            Password
                        </Text>
                        <TextInput style = {tw`border-2 text-xl h-10 rounded `}/>
                    </View>
                    <View>
                    <CheckBox
                        value={isSelected}
                        onValueChange={setSelection}
                        />
                    <Text>
                        I agree with 
                    </Text>
                    </View>
                    <TouchableOpacity style = {tw`border-2 border-orange-300 bg-orange-300 font-black text-gray-100 text-xl h-10 text-center rounded my-5`}>
                        SUBMIT
                    </TouchableOpacity>
                </View>
            </View>    
        </View>
        <View style = {tw`h-full w-1/2 bg-gray-200`}>
            <Image />        
        </View>
    </View>
)}
